mapper.insert: insert into s_user (user_id, user_name, realname, password, age, idcard, phone, sex, email, dept_id, remark, create_time, is_exists) values (#{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{isExists,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update s_user set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, realname = #{realname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=INTEGER}, idcard = #{idcard,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, phone = #{phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, dept_id = #{deptId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_exists = #{isExists,jdbcType=INTEGER} where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select user_id, user_name, realname, password, age, idcard, phone, sex, email, dept_id, remark, create_time, is_exists from s_user where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
